lender.name: Lou
lender.loan_because: It's easy and effective
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company that makes computer software

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people hand up, not a hand out!

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help small technology businesses plan and market themselves.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: "For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required"
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Ontario Provincial Government.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I wanted to see how the Kiva process works - and want to be part of a solution - no matter how small or large.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure that our hospital lives the mission and values of our organization -- which is to reveal God's love for all - especially the poor and vulnerable.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: there are many others less fortunate than I am, and I want to do my part to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently attending university to further my education.

lender.name: jason
lender.loan_because: I like the Kiva concept, I work with individuals every day, and I like to see exactly who I am helping out.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back, in grass-roots economic development, and the ability of one person to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I handle administative and financial matters for a private Pre-K through 12th grade school in the Dominican Republic

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it's a personalized way to empower women and make a diference, however small.

lender.name: Singleton
lender.loan_because: I care to try and give like Jesus commanded to give to the poor, this is not just giving but teaching them to fish like he taught his disciples to teach with FAITH when you fish(or entrepreneur) I wanted to remain anonymous but to network with other Kiva Lenders you must go public. I am wrestling with this idea, as I think it was said that when you give do not tell your left hand what your right hand is doing. So being public, makes this for me at least a struggle to remain pure at heart as a 'true giver' instead of just another entrepreneur. But, all of this said? It isn't about me or my 'feelings' but more about planting seeds that can grow. And to do this? I lend. Lending with Kiva plants seeds of Hope but also links the lender or tither so that they might witness the growth and learn exactly how their tithe works instead of just randomly dishing it out to an unknown corporation (non-profit) without ever having any control. I have given to churches in the past where I questioned the legitimacy of the spending. Here you get to the root of the need. Keeping it very simple. I like Simple.
lender.occupational_info: I use a fairly simple mechanical and electronic device to capture images of the world. In these images, it helps to remind people what God has created, and what we must do as human beings all of us children of God to help one another by giving. Only truly giving is living!

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I think it's a fantastic opportunity to help give a determined person a foot up!
lender.occupational_info: I organise people so that they all work together to build computer systems for large businesses.

lender.name: Philippe
lender.loan_because: Having lived and traveled in Asia, I know how much people need help and how difficult it is to organize it in an efficient way. I hope that by supporting organizations like Kiva, the world will be a bit better. I also believe that if many people do small things, we can change the world.

lender.name: Accelerators
lender.loan_because: We are a passionate group of NAB people who want to help people who have had less opportunity than we have had.
lender.occupational_info: Providing banking and finance solutions to NAB customers around the world.

lender.name: Markus
lender.loan_because: i highly value people making the effort of improving their lives.

lender.name: Allen and Raine
lender.loan_because: to create a beautiful garden, you must first plant some seeds.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I hope I can make a little difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people.

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and it's the right thing to do. It's great to see the entrepreneur's photo and watch as the amount of money being lent grows and gets to their goal. It's a good way to feel like I am helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I help people feel better using Pilates exercises. I help people who have been in car accidents, people who have spinal issues as well as the general population. I teach them how to do Pilates exercises that will eliminate pain, make them stronger and help them feel better.

lender.name: Mary Lou
lender.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities become part of their community, go to school and work.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: i want to help motivated people

lender.name: Carol & Jason
lender.loan_because: We support empowering entrepreneurial individuals, local sustainable economies, and poverty alleviation
lender.occupational_info: Jason currently works for an organization helping farmers develop environmentally sustainable practices, while Carol is currently in school to become a lawyer.

lender.name: Quinton
lender.loan_because: I want to help others, who have the ambition but not the funding, succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I assist with the running of an engineering and construction company.

lender.name: elaine
lender.loan_because: I need urgent money to set up a typing office at home, since I am a mom with six children the last two are still small, (9 mnths old) I need to stay at home and start on my own.
lender.occupational_info: typiing for companies, industries etc.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: It's a chance for others to realize their potential and improve their businesses, regardless of what scale they are at
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that helps clients understand their customers, and connect with them. We do this by combining creativity and technology in various ways.

lender.name: MICHI
lender.occupational_info: I am engaged in external audit. I am interested in business that I have never imagined.

lender.name: Inge & Victoria
lender.loan_because: As an artist and crafts person I don't make much money, but I still feel so priviliged. I am rich in many ways, have a warm, safe house, enough food and access to good education. Why not share what I can with some other women and give them a chance to improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I paint (oils mostly) and make unique textile crafts which I sell at the Farmer's Market and at local stores.

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: I believe completely in micro credit as a viable solution to global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a motivational speaker/musician/child educator and philanthopist. My goal is to inspire change and harmony amongst our youth in Canada and around the world.

lender.name: CookieSunshine
lender.loan_because: we are all connected and have a responsibility to do what we can for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I create illustrations and write poems. I paint things that are whimsical. I create happy art.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur myself, I like the idea of helping other people who are trying to launch or run their own business, especially those in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I develop concepts and write the words for marketing and communications pieces such as radio, television, video and print.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I run a business myself and believe that investing directly in hard working people is the best way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies on ways to operate more efficiently.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: 1) It increases productivity in impoverished countries. 2) It benefits not only the recipient of the loan but their community as well. 3) Local food production is better for the environment. 4) Doing my part to save the world =)

lender.name: Ian and Beth
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are motivated to improve their own financial situation.
lender.occupational_info: I want to help those that are less fortunate than I am.

lender.name: M.L.D
lender.loan_because: I want to do a research, to utilize the rain water.
lender.occupational_info: I am doing researches to find out efficient methods to rainwater harvesting.

lender.name: Yee
lender.loan_because: it is most refreshing to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: pension consulting

lender.name: Mirko
lender.loan_because: It seems to me to be a small thing I can do that could make a huge impact to a person, family, community and country.

lender.name: Maya
lender.loan_because: I like to travel and encounter different cultures.

lender.name: Deb Matheson
lender.loan_because: i

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I have two jobs. One is administrative, and the other involves working with local artists (including painters, musicians, etc.) to promote their work.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people directly who need a hand to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Not working right now, but when I was, I was part of a team that created new foodservice products.

lender.name: Dwayne
lender.loan_because: Nice to see how a relatively small amount of money can make a difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: I create and promote websites to help people sell things on the internet. My main website is NorCalCars.com where I display used cars for sale by local dealers.

lender.name: Luca
lender.loan_because: For Helping unfortunately people with a little effort.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student and a Web Publisher, Developer, Webmaster and IT Consultant.

lender.name: Shbiha
lender.loan_because: A journey of thousand miles begins with a single step.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: It's important to help one another -- We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I cast non-speaking roles in feature films. All the beautiful faces in the background of a scene -- this is what I cast. I write comedy and I love to laugh. Story is an amazing thing.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: It's great to support others who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a federal government agency that protects various sections of ocean surrounding the United States.

lender.name: Lucia & Fidelis
lender.loan_because: of the joy and the power of our project seedgiveback to improve lives and human dignity
lender.occupational_info: interested in stewardship, impact and investing in human dignity

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because:
I am an adoptive Mom to a Guatemalan-born son. I want to help the hard-working people in my son's country of birth.
When no available loan requests are available for my son's country of birth, I want to help families with children.
When I compare the value of the American dollar to it's equilivant in second and third world countries, I can see just how much of a difference a small loan is to these families.
lender.occupational_info: Federal Government

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: everything in the world is connected in some way. This program gives me a chance to provide aid to other people in the world whose causes and work I support. We often travel to other countries for enjoyment, and yet the people in those countries may never have that same opportunity. Loans are a good way to allow others to enjoy their lives a little more and produce something of value to their communities.
lender.occupational_info: In addition to having a freelance graphic design practice, I work for a branding firm. A 'brand' is someone's feeling about a particular company and what it offers, so 'branding' is a process of using strategy and design to improve a company's organization, function and appearance to the public. If a company is well branded, its audience will have the best possible collective feeling about it. Our firm strives to organize all aspects of a company by positioning them in the marketplace (giving them a sense of who they are and why they matter), creating new and improved messaging for them (how a company presents themselves in writing to their audiences), organizing all their products and services into a clear hierarchy that meshes with the overall brand ideals and the positioning, and designing identities for them (logos, supporting graphic systems, and all instances of logo/visual system placement on all types of products, services and marketing materials).

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Because it makes me feel good to help others.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I like that, for a relatively small amount of money, I can be part of a worldwide community of lenders and entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am active as a volunteer. I tell stories to children and adults, serve as a director of a storytelling group and mentor a child in elementary school.

lender.name: Gaye
lender.loan_because: Being involved in helping others is most rewarding, and this organization certainly gets to the grassroots with their aid

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference in others' lives.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: no one will believe in you if you don't believe in the others

lender.name: Solange
lender.loan_because: I have to if I can
lender.occupational_info: As a fun thing to do

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It is important for me that my limited resources are spent making tangible change in the lives of individuals, rather than being spent funding the organizational structure of large charities.
lender.occupational_info: I am starting a Ph.D in Political Science, with a focus on theory, specifically issues of global justice.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to be able to provide person to person help.
lender.occupational_info: I help Canadian families set up savings plans to fund post secondary education for their children.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We're all bozos on this bus. Which is to say, we're all together on this planet and when we help one, we help many.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing good fortune with those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the banking sector.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it is a blessing to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Mother, grandmother and secretary at a social workerÂ´s office.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with small complicated electronic machines.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: Their are people in need
lender.occupational_info: I help retirement plans manage their money, so that their employees have money when they retire.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have a wonderful life and would like to "pay it forward".
lender.occupational_info: I help people in debt to resolve their financial problems.

lender.name: Dan & Season
lender.loan_because: my wife and I want to make other peoples goals attainable.
lender.occupational_info: I research how to restore streams and rivers and my wife is a pediatric nurse.

lender.name: Vickie
lender.loan_because: Loaning strengthens the world. It helps others prosper, bringing better living conditions to the recipients and their families. It also helps build connections between people and societies, and that promotes understanding, empathy, harmony, and peace. It's all good.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and maintain school library resources and help students and teachers access and use those resources. This advances education, making the world a better place for all. I encourage reading and teach research and writing skills. I do my best to help students grow academically, socially, and emotionally. I want them all to become responsible, self-sufficient, well-informed, open-minded, curious, and caring world citizens.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because:
I work as an Architect and an entrepreneur, I set up companies and develop software systems to run them. I know that it can be challenging to make a business successful and can hardly imagine how hard it must be if there is no easy source of funding.
I find it inspirational to help others around the world to achieve their ambitions and dreams. It empowers them and me. I easily get as much out of it as they do.
lender.occupational_info: I run a several companies, One develops software to run businesses, another (in partnership with others) markets and sells lighting design into Architects and interior designers, another is a service provider, offering a sales team, operations and warehousing resources. I also work in the field of self development, helping people realise that their only limitations are their beliefs and that since they were adopted they can be changed. I do this as part of Avatarepc.com

lender.name: michel & Angela
lender.loan_because: I know how important it is to be able to access a loan when building a business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed photographer. I enjoy photography because of the people I meet, the places I see, the things I learn and experience, whether I am photographing a wedding in Kelowna British Columbia, making a business portrait in Vancouver, discussing a concept for an advertising photograph, or just chatting with a pilot on my way back from a shoot in Alberta.

lender.name: P, H, M & S
lender.loan_because: We got tired of hearing about Americans who can't pay off the mortgages on their expensive homes, so we decided this was our act of "civil disobedience" to our consumer culture.

lender.name: Kandra
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help people empower themselves

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupation: Stay at home dad/part time software support

lender.name: Giao-Anh
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life beyond what I could earn or deserve. It gives me joy to share His blessings with people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade students in an elementary school.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I think it's important to foster growth in individuals who have drive and ambition but are lacking in capital. I hope that my small contribution will make a positive difference in the lives of a family or community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with independent recording artists in Canada.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.occupational_info: I get to work with children everyday! I get to see them change the world, grow into inspiring and critical thinking beans. I get to help children see a bright future, I get to assist children challenge, explore and seek the world they live in every single day. I couldn't ask for a better "job."

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I work for a charity where people are in need and realize that everyone needs a helping hand sometimes
lender.occupational_info: Having spent my career in sales, I am now using my sales and marketing skills to raise funds to help families who are facing challenges in their lives.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Lucas
lender.loan_because: This world is made into what it is today by entrepreneurs throughout human history, we should bless them with our courage, help in any way we can to make their dreams a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I am grateful for everything that I've got, and live each day as if it's my last.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Formerly with IBM Canada, I am now retired.

lender.name: Salma
lender.loan_because: I want to make a small difference in the world. God put me on this earth for a few reasons and this is one of them!
lender.occupational_info: I give smiles back to people who have lost theirs.

lender.name: Izzy
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a good reason not to!
lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for an organization that provides quality child care for low-income, working families.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Change starts with one person...I want my daughter and son (and all children) to live in a better world

lender.name: Caleb
lender.loan_because: I owe it to those who have not at this time
lender.occupational_info: Philosophy/Religion Major

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I won the human lottery by being born where I did and have been very fortunate my whole life and feel it is my duty to try and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I represent buyers and seller's of residential property in and around Steamboat Colorado.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: of the human spirit.
lender.occupational_info: Helping humans use technology with ease and comfort.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: People help people.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I like Kiva because it helps to restore fairness, dignity, and the opportunity to work and maintain community wellness to all peoples in all nations. What a wonderful idea!
lender.occupational_info: I support my clients in reducing stress or worry in their lives and resolve problems within their families. I often help men who have problems with anger and violence to learn how to let go of what they have learned, replacing it with self-love and responsibility to others.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: We should!
lender.occupational_info: Fly people through the sky in pressurized aluminum tubes.

lender.name: Brittney
lender.loan_because: I think this is an amazing way to reach out to people who are doing everything they can to improve the lives of their families. One day I want to be able to volunteer in the places that I donate to...but for now I want to make an impact in every way I can!

lender.name: David Abdo
lender.loan_because: I want someone to have the opportunity to realize one of their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I produce and distribute music to people all over the world.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Hey, it's not like I'm using the money at the time, so someone else may as well.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning stuff.

lender.name: Yuliana and my dog, Bola
lender.occupational_info: Yuliana - nothing too exciting to share Bola - my job is very tough, I have to play all day, hide my squeaky toys to every corner, and chase my glorious tail which is very difficult to catch.

lender.name: Mauro e Luisa
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I make the internet.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: N/A

lender.name: Rolan Napitupulu
lender.loan_because: together we can make a difference...

lender.name: Hanno
lender.loan_because: Paying tribute to entrepreneurship and the pursuit of better living conditions is good, supporting it is better.

lender.name: Mika
lender.loan_because: I'd like to see industrious people prosper despite their original powerty.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a CEO and entrepreneur in several small companies.

lender.name: Liliane Emma Lesley
lender.loan_because: We want to be kind to people. (Emma - on the left) We want to help people around the world. (Lesley - on the right) We are inspired by people who act on their dreams, we love learning about others around the world and we recognize that, by comparison with others, we have so much, so it's good to share. (Liliane, writer & mum) - ELL Banco!
lender.occupational_info: We (Emma and Lesley) are 13 year old home educating twins who love gymnastics! I (Liliane) am a writer and speaker. My book, The Mastery Club - See the Invisible, Hear the Silent, Do the Impossible, is about young people who take responsibility for achieving their goals and making their dreams come true!

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: Small things can make huge differences in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people & businesses crash proof their financial future.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe in sustainable help.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I will soon study International Relations and hope to work in different locations across the globe.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help people break out of poverty. I believe the best thing you can do is to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large software vendor managing software development projects.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I believe we need to think globally in terms of economy and help everyone succeed in their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a world filled with beauty and do everything I can to share that.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I give what I can
lender.occupational_info: none

lender.name: Yolande Ankersmit
lender.loan_because: I am a quilter, piecing little bits of material together. The work of KIVA seems similar, making a big difference by many little bits of money!
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am a counselor helping people to get a focus on their lives. I have been a career counselor for almost 20 years. And I run a guestroom in our beautifull former coffeewarehouse. My guests love the historical city of Deventer.

lender.name: Marian & Randy
lender.loan_because: I have been so fortunate in my life and I would like to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I own a manufacturing business with my husband.

lender.name: THE DQ CLAN
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who want to succeed!!

lender.name: Juris Gallardo
lender.loan_because: as a working student, its the best i can do to help improve one's life.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good inside.
lender.occupational_info: anything smaller than a nanometer.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of being able to help those who help themselves. I am very thankful for the life I have and being able to share with others makes me a happier person.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: The truth is: because I feel guilty. I have so much by comparison. Also, I trust the process and believe my small contributions reach the people in need. Thank you KIVA workers!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Whenever we went travelling, people shared their lifes and homes with us. With this loan we hope to send this good vibe further around. We also hope to make someones day!
lender.occupational_info: climbing...yoga...love...laugh....travel...

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it makes me happy

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: II Corinthians 8:13 -15
lender.occupational_info: Charitable and business proposal development.

lender.name: mansoor
lender.occupation: Direct marketing coordinator for a NGO
lender.loan_because: It's my Islamic duty, to help everyone who is in need
lender.occupational_info: Fellow human being sharing this planet with everyone else. Adam was created from dirt obtained from different parts of the earth to represent our uniqueness, and we shall return back to dirt.

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: i like to know im helping out people around the world

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: Maybe it will make a small difference --- $25 at a time.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital taking care of sick people.

lender.name: Ovett
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and I am employed in leadership programs at the University of Arizona.

lender.name: Angie
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's our duty to help and encourage people in need to be self-sufficient!
lender.occupational_info: My work is liberating and free to express my point of view!

lender.name: Soma
lender.loan_because: this is a good way to contribute to the community and getting to know whats happening around the world
lender.occupational_info: i am a homemaker and a mother of a toddler. (i guess that doesnt need much of an explanation!)

lender.name: Mary Beth
lender.loan_because: because we live on this great big blue marble together, and anybody who knows me will tell you I am a giver.
lender.occupational_info: As a nurse I help heal, teach, care and love my patients.

lender.name: Veronica & Niki
lender.loan_because: I realize hard work and determination are not the only tools you need to succeed in life.

lender.name: Dilnaaz
lender.loan_because: It's one small way of doing something for the betterment of those who need a helping hand to become self sufficient.

lender.name: Antonio & Alexia
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in other people's lives. There is nothing greater than reaching out to help those in need. If we can make one child smile everyday by our actions... we in turn will be happy.
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell houses. And we dance for the fun of it. Our hobby is ballroom dancing.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance

lender.name: Norm & Sharon
lender.loan_because: To us this is a fantastic way to help others to help themselves. As a former business owner we know what gratification you can get from having your own business.
lender.occupational_info: I was a business owner who after 33 years decided to sell my business

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I first heard of this concept about 20 years ago..but there was no way that individuals could become involved in microcredit financing. This a brillant execution of a wonderful concept.
lender.occupational_info: Simply put I help to raise funds for non-profits. I am retired from the investment business.

lender.name: Earl
lender.loan_because:
I admire people who persevere in lands where there is great hardship - especially the hardship of war.
I live in a land of peace and plenty so it is easy to share.

lender.name: Leonor
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to pursue their dreams through hard work.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to support others but to do it in such a way that isn't charity and provides incentives to earn a living

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the lives of others
lender.occupational_info: Personnel Secretary for a High School

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by my children. Two, Brendan and Tess, are with Engineers Without Borders, and Brendan has gone twice to Senegal with EWB. All of my kids intend to make the world a better place, and this is my small way of contributing to that.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I hope that I can help make the world a slightly better place by helping people that are invested in their family's future.
lender.occupational_info: Mortgage Technology

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I want to help others grow.
lender.occupational_info: I do research to help understand why some individuals suffer from mental disturbances. With the findings of the research, new treatments can be developed.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: This is a incredible opportunity to be involved in a self sustainable way to directly help those that need it most and to pay it forward.

lender.name: ALLENE
lender.loan_because: This seems like a great way to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people reach their own decisions about a dispute and find Agreement

lender.name: Ahsan
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving and sharing. I love to assist the true needy ones, who are deprived of the good times.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Project Manager in California, USA.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.occupational_info: Investment Banking

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a way I can have a direct positive impact on someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a highschool geography teacher.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupational_info: I work for an organization that provides supports and services to people with developmental disabilities. It's our mission to have all people from all walks of life living and working as one.

lender.name: Marianne
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired grandmother with a major responsibility of raising my 10 year old granddaughter.

lender.name: Sushi Aficionado Group
lender.loan_because: We like to support fish farmers and merchants around the world to replenish our fish/seafood consumption. Visit our website and you'll understand why we loan...

lender.name: priscilla
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying International business with a hope to focus on combining micro-lending and fashion designers to distribute to boutiques all over the world.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to others who are living close to nature and it just feels right
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to communicate to get their important needs met. For some how to be more assertive, for others how to connect with themselves and others - it is work of the heart

lender.name: Lala
lender.loan_because: I believe in this microcredit thing. However, I am looking/waiting for someone who is actually doing a business for the greater good...something fresh...something visionary, not just making money for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy tour guiding, public relations, writing, acting, singing, creating, imagining, and helping people now and for the future.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: if everyone helped just a little, great changes can be made.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Maizies
lender.loan_because: We like to make a difference in a lot of small ways to other women in Adelaide and around the world.

lender.name: Shelley & Greg
lender.loan_because: It seems fair to share some of our good fortune -- and Kiva's smart giving.
lender.occupational_info: a magazine journalist and a fishing tackle guru

lender.name: madlyscout
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: i like music :-)

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to able to loan money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a computer programmer working on an electronic medical record application at a major hospital

lender.name: Elsie
lender.loan_because: I would like my children to know that they are incredibly lucky and privileged. And for them to learn that they can take action and make a difference.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: This world needs our help...
lender.occupational_info: I make clothing for people who are involved in the Drum & Bass Music culture...

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: We are all one.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I have this opportunity to do so :)

lender.name: Zhongkai LI
lender.loan_because: I know how largely our lives can be changed. I myself was born in a poor village in China. I wish all chichren and families will have bright futures.
lender.occupational_info: I am struggling to complete my PhD.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to help those that are willing to help themselves. Success breeds success.
lender.occupational_info: Sales in the golf industry

lender.name: Venetya
lender.loan_because: I want to help families and communities to rise above poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software programs.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have more than enough but there are so many who need so much. Tengo mÃ¡s que es suficiente pero hay tantas personas que necesitan tanto.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I beleive in supporting those that want to make a difference in their lives and have good ideas to put to practice for the good of the community and themselves
lender.occupational_info: I assist companies across the globe to reach their goals and objectives

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: If you have the money, why wouldn't you? You are essentially changing people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a research centre that hopes to find out more about certain behaviours that impact on health, such as alcohol use, and how we can change these behaviours to improve health.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe that enabling independent businessmen and businesswomen to succeed is the most effective way to impact developing economies. I believe that individual help, not monies that get side-tracked by corrupt governments, will make the biggest difference to people and to the future.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: i can.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the possibility and opportunity to get a better life! and this is a great way to do it!

lender.name: mark
lender.occupation: just someone who wants to help

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I like the consept of being able to help an identifyable single person or a group of people, who are struggling in reaching their defined goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer software company in Norway, focusing on open source solutions (Linux, etc.). I give away our own software for free, but at the same time offering services like support and training - but this is strictly optional.

lender.name: Tracey
lender.loan_because: we are the lucky country....I wish our luck to others
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses and farms

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: As a tangible representative of Christ in the world and out of the unlimited riches He has given to His children, I'm striving to give opportunity to those who aren't as fortunate as me.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Every now and then it's good to take step back from the materialistic world we live in, and offer a helping hand to others less fortunate.

lender.name: R&R
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and why not share what we have - we think the the loans mean the world to those in need and we are indeed happy for the difference that our small loans can make

lender.name: Byron
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
"Behold, I am making all things new" - Jesus Christ
"He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done." Prov 19:17

lender.name: Richard & Bethany
lender.loan_because:
You know that saying "Give a man a fish and he will eat for a day. Teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"? Kiva operates on a similar principal. We could donate to a charity that hands out food or clothing, but isn't it better to give money to help support the growth of a person's business -- the source of her income -- so she can buy her own food and clothing? We liked that idea and felt our gift would have a bigger impact on an individual life through Kiva.
We chose to support Maria because we have traveled through Central America, know the poor conditions that many people live in there, and wanted to help a woman with a family. We hope her business is successful!
lender.occupational_info: Richard is a police officer, and Bethany is director of communications for a foundation that strives for patient safety in hospitals.

lender.name: Josephine
lender.loan_because: it is such a direct way to help others do what they want in their lives

lender.name: Michael and Martha
lender.loan_because: We got a KIVA gift certificate from the matron of honor at our wedding!
lender.occupational_info: Michael works at a local bank; Martha teaches writing at a community college.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: Seems to a good way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair equipment in a factory enviroment.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: It's an ideal way to help an individual or group directly
lender.occupational_info: For a charity raising funds to help provide free veterinary treatment for sick & injured pets

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born where I was and everyone is not that lucky. I believe that every life has equal value and those that have more should help those that do not. I am not rich by any means but I can at least do something.

lender.name: rachelle and james
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to be able to follow our passion of telling stories through video and understand that there are millions of other people who simply require a hand up in regards to their business. "Be the change you want to see in the world!"
lender.occupational_info: Video production/ Journalism

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in my life on many levels. In addition to a certain amount of financial success, I've been lucky to travel to many other countries around the world. I love the fact that I can now be of service to entrepreneurs around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: Although I'm now retired from my primary career as a Certified Public Accountant and Certified Fraud Examiner, I like to keep a little active in the business world. Today, I am an online sales representative for a holisitic pet food company.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's amazing what you can do when you leave the Politicians at home !

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe in teaching people how to fish :-)
lender.occupational_info: Help people to secure a job at my company.

lender.name: Tom and Deb Nystrom
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help neighbors around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Deb helps people recover form injuries, Tom protects rivers and wetlands from destruction.

lender.name: Mevrouw Gitaar
lender.loan_because: I hope it is a good idea

lender.occupational_info: I work at University of Bath in the UK, my job role is the BSc Accounting and Finance admissions and degree course administrator.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: I just read about this in the newspaper and liked what I read.
lender.occupational_info: I direct / manage a team of individuals to better serve our goals and clients.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be living the life of my dreams. I want to help others realize their dreams and live the life that they dream of.
lender.occupational_info: By day, I find jobs for people. By night, I write stories and knit.

lender.name: Cathleen
lender.loan_because: To help someone
lender.occupational_info: Verbatim reporting

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.loan_because: It's a Mitzvah!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: we care and we can.

lender.loan_because: people across the globe deserve the chance to earn a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I make people better.

lender.occupational_info: I work with young people - as a tutor, coach, and example.

lender.occupational_info: I teach social studies to middle and high school students.

lender.occupation: Business Analyst and Small Business Owner
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help out hard-working entrepreneurs in places where a little money goes a long way. Even better is that you can help over and over again as each loan gets paid back.
